description: The hospital blaze in St Petersburg appears to have been caused by a short-circuit in a ventilator.
title: Coronavirus: Ventilator fire blamed for Russia Covid-19 deaths
title_page: Coronavirus: Ventilator fire blamed for Russia Covid-19 deaths - BBC News
maintext: The All-Russia Institute for Medical Technology Research points out that there are many different types of medical ventilator, so a fault in one may not be common to others.
